input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Core Jersey White/Black"
Reference Product Description:
The all-new Core Jersey is a high-quality staple for cyclists in pursuit of optimal comfort and durability. Our sustainable manufacturing process has evolved to incorporate recycled yarns, while the ultra-soft knitted fabric provides superior durability and form-fitting compression for all body types. Lightweight construction enhances the freedom of movement, and advanced moisture-wicking technology regulates body temperature during intense rides. With three convenient rear pockets and a zipper-secured storage pocket, youâ€™ll have ample space to stow your riding essentials. Arriving in five new colourways, the reimagined CORE Jersey is a must-have addition to your cycling wardrobe.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='men Santini Paris-Roubaix 2025 Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Durable MTB Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Simbolo Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT Long Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Sportful Light Pro Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Trail-Ready & Quick-Dry MTB Jersey'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Prologo 7 Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Castelli Climber's 4.0 Jersey'
  - Name='Assos Mille GT SS C2 EVO Limited Edition Jersey'
  - Name='Santini Eco Sleek Dinamo Short Sleeve Jersey Man'
  - Name='Santini x UCI Riga Slim Fit Jersey'
  - Name='Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Tech Snap Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Jersey'
  - Name='Men's Pearl Izumi Summit Short Sleeve Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Expedition Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Elite Pursuit Speed Cycling Jersey'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi PRO Short Sleeve Road Jersey'
  - Name='MAAP Aerate Pro Air Jersey 3.0'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey'
  - Name='Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts'
  - Name='WoPedal Mafia Men's Core Jersey'
  - Name='WoPedal Men's Mafia Core Jersey'
  - Name='WoPedal Men's Mafia Core Long Sleeve Jersey'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Quest Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a men's short sleeve cycling jersey, similar in function and typical design to the reference Core Jersey, likely with comparable features for comfort and performance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: men Santini Paris-Roubaix 2025 Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also a cycling jersey but long sleeve, so slightly different silhouette; still relevant as a high-quality technical cycling jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Long Sleeve Durable MTB Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve and intended for MTB (mountain biking), may have different cut and material focus but still a cycling jersey aimed at durability.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Simbolo Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A cycling jersey for men, presumably short sleeve, designed for road cycling similar to the Core Jersey, making it quite relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GT Long Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Long sleeve cycling jersey with performance features, relevant but differs in sleeve length.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Light Pro Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a lightweight short sleeve cycling jersey designed for performance, very similar in function and style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Trail-Ready & Quick-Dry MTB Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: An MTB jersey designed with trail-specific features and quick-dry fabrics; while cycling oriented, MTB focus reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Men's Prologo 7 Short Sleeve Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's short sleeve performance cycling jersey, closely related in use and construction to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Climber's 4.0 Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely a technical climbing-focused cycling jersey, still similar but may focus more on lightweight and climbing-specific features.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve high-performance cycling jersey, very comparable in core features to the Core Jersey.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve road cycling jersey with an ecological aspect, quite similar in function, construction, and sustainability focus to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Santini x UCI Riga Slim Fit Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit road cycling jersey, similar silhouette but unclear on sleeve length or fabric specifics; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Columbine Men's Ultra-Light Mesh Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Ultra-light mesh road jersey, focusing on breathability, relevant but potentially different fabric texture and intended conditions.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Canyon Tech Snap Cycling Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Technical cycling jersey with snap features for fit adjustment; similar category but with different design details.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Classic Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic men's cycling jersey, likely similar short sleeve style and material, very relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Men's Pearl Izumi Summit Short Sleeve Jersey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve cycling jersey with performance features, similar function and form factor.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Elite Pursuit Speed Cycling Jersey

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve professional-level road jersey, highly comparable to the Core Jersey in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Women's Core Jersey

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pedal Mafia Men's Cycling Core Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib shorts are a different cycling apparel category and serve a different function than jerseys, so low relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Appears to be the exact same menâ€™s Core Jersey product, perhaps a typographical variant; identical product.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Likely the same product as the reference Core Jersey, given name similarity and description; identical product.
